001package org.biopax.paxtools.impl.level3;
002
003import org.biopax.paxtools.model.level3.*;
004import org.biopax.paxtools.model.level3.Process;
005import org.biopax.paxtools.util.BPCollections;
006import org.biopax.paxtools.util.IllegalBioPAXArgumentException;
007
008import java.util.Collections;
009import java.util.HashSet;
010import java.util.Set;
011
012
013public class  ControlImpl extends InteractionImpl
014                implements Control
015{
016// ------------------------------ FIELDS ------------------------------
017
018        private ControlType controlType;
019        private Set<Pathway> pathwayController;
020        private Set<PhysicalEntity> peController;
021        private Set<Process> controlled;
022
023// --------------------------- CONSTRUCTORS ---------------------------
024
025        public ControlImpl()
026        {
027                pathwayController = BPCollections.I.createSafeSet();
028                peController = BPCollections.I.createSafeSet();
029                controlled = BPCollections.I.createSafeSet();
030        }
031
032// ------------------------ INTERFACE METHODS ------------------------
033
034        public Class<? extends Control> getModelInterface()
035        {
036                return Control.class;
037        }
038
039// --------------------- Interface Control ---------------------
040
041// --------------------- ACCESORS and MUTATORS---------------------
042
043        public ControlType getControlType()
044        {
045                return controlType;
046        }
047
048        public void setControlType(ControlType ControlType)
049        {
050                this.controlType = ControlType;
051        }
052
053        public Set<Process> getControlled()
054        {
055                return this.controlled;
056        }
057
058        public void addControlled(Process process)
059        {
060                if (process != null) {
061                        if (!checkControlled(process)) {
062                                throw new IllegalBioPAXArgumentException("Illegal argument. Attempting to set "
063                                                + process.getUri() + " to " + this.getUri());
064                        } else { //TODO: in paxtools v6, disallow multiple values (OWL functional property)...
065                                controlled.add(process);
066                                process.getControlledOf().add(this);
067                                super.addParticipant(process);
068                        }
069                }
070        }
071
072        public void removeControlled(Process controlled)
073        {
074                if(controlled != null) {
075                        super.removeParticipant(controlled);
076                        controlled.getControlledOf().remove(this);
077                        this.controlled.remove(controlled);
078                }
079        }
080
081        public Set<Controller> getController()
082        {
083                Set<Controller> controller = new HashSet<Controller>(this.getPeController());
084                controller.addAll(getPathwayController());
085                return Collections.unmodifiableSet(controller);
086        }
087
088        public void addController(Controller controller)
089        {
090                if (controller != null) {
091                        if (controller instanceof Pathway) {
092                                pathwayController.add((Pathway) controller);
093                        } else {
094                                peController.add((PhysicalEntity) controller);
095                        }
096                        controller.getControllerOf().add(this);
097                        super.addParticipant(controller);
098                }
099        }
100
101        public void removeController(Controller controller)
102        {
103                if (controller != null) {
104                        super.removeParticipant(controller);
105                        controller.getControllerOf().remove(this);
106                        if (controller instanceof Pathway) {
107                                pathwayController.remove(controller);
108                        } else if(controller instanceof PhysicalEntity) {
109                                peController.remove(controller);
110                        } else { //hardly ever possible, anyway -
111                                throw new IllegalBioPAXArgumentException("removeController: argument " + controller.getUri()
112                                        + " is neither Pathway nor PE - " + controller.getModelInterface().getSimpleName());
113                        }
114                }
115        }
116
117
118        // -------------------------- OTHER METHODS --------------------------
119        protected boolean checkControlled(Process Controlled)
120        {
121                return true;
122        }
123
124        protected Set<Pathway> getPathwayController()
125        {
126                return pathwayController;
127        }
128
129        protected Set<PhysicalEntity> getPeController()
130        {
131                return peController;
132        }
133
134}
